title: Unsung heroes: Bart Lemmen on his journey from the platoon to the peloton
content:
He left the Dutch Air Force last year to turn professional with Human Powered Health: 'My road to being a professional cyclist is so very uncommon.'

Read the full article at Unsung heroes: Bart Lemmen on his journey from the platoon to the peloton on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
